1.0.name: wordpress/easy-speak-download-user-data
1.0.description:
Yet another useful plugin for connecting to your website user base from the "easy speak wordpress plugin team" team. As always this plugin is simple to use and efficient at delivering what you need. Simply navigate to wp-admin-> Settings(left sidebar) -> Easy Speak Download User Data and click the button. You will then recieve an email (sent to the blog administrator's email address) containing a ".csv" file containing the user data in a row by row format.

written by: Luke
